0: Aiiyo my name is Kanyeezy from the Roc-A fam
1: And where the Glocks don't jam, so where we pop them scrams
2: See I showed you on the champions how we get down
3: So don't twist ya lips, I'm like Bobby Brown
4: You got B2K on all your bedroom wall
